title: New: Elite Gymnastics – Life / Trap
body:
**Elite Gymnastics** may well have just ‘won’ the title Best Beat of 2012 with this hypnotic, trance inducing new track _Life / Trap_.

Featuring the ever-lethargic vocals and with **CFCF** on production duties, you can guarantee that you’re on to a winner. Oh, and as always, they’re in an ever optimistic mood; ‘you think your life’s a circle but it’s a decline’. Brilliant. _Life / Trap_ features on _**RUIN 4**_ which was released on 8 May available to purchase [here](http://acephale.bigcartel.com/).
